import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom" const Header = () => { const [customers, setCustomers] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:9292/customers") .then(r => r.json()) .then(setCustomers) },[]) return (

Casa Maya Tequila

Home Shop Cart Previous Orders
) } export default Header
